content: Una mattina, quando mi sono svegliata ho scoperto che tutte le banconote nel mio portafoglio si erano trasformate in banconote da duemila yen.
translations: eng:One morning, when I woke up, I found that all the bills in my wallet had changed into two-thousand yen bills
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
